fehd.ADR_EN: 118/F (PORTION A), THE RITZ-CARLTON HONG KONG, 1 AUSTIN ROAD WEST, TSIM SHA TSUI, KOWLOON
fehd.ADR_TC: 九龍尖沙咀柯士甸道西1號 香港麗思卡爾頓酒店118樓 (A部份)

geocode_tc.formatted_address: Level 118 International Commerce Centre (ICC, 1 Austin Rd W, Tsim Sha Tsui, 香港

result.adr_address: Level 118 International Commerce Centre (ICC, 1 Austin Rd W, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Level 118 International Commerce Centre (ICC, 1 Austin Rd W, Tsim Sha Tsui, Hong Kong
result.name: OZONE

reviews.text: It's certainly impressive being so high up. I was a little disappointed that outside is only open to the sky and you have to look out through glass. There is still a nice breeze and good views but if your want nighttime photos of Central, the views are not as good as they could be, owing the lightning causing reflections in the  glass which surrounds the outdoor bar. Slightly lower bars are better for photography.

Drinks are very pricey, but the views from the top are breathtaking. If you are willing to spend outrageous prices for drinks you will enjoy your visit. A great spot to watch the nightly light show. The service was incredible as to be expected at the Ritz. They offered complimentary popcorn which was delicious. We got there very early so it wasn’t too crowded. If you want an amazing view of Hong Kong, visit OZONE.

One of the coolest bars in the world!  Incredible views of Hong Kong and the ships coming in from the sea.  Be sure to dress nice and bring some long sleeves if you plan on sitting outside (it gets chilly).  The drink prices are high, but you're getting an incredible view.  Get there early for happy hour and you could even get taken to the VIP room to get the best views of the city!
Had a blast at this venue. I would definitely love to come back. The crowd was fun, drinks were great, and the music was surprisingly good.

It’s a nice view but that’s it! Me and some friends went there and they even came to ask what we want to order so we just leave. I recommend you to go and just take some pictures and leave the place. The money you will spend in one drink there you can have like 4 drinks somewhere else.

result.name: OZONE酒吧

reviews.text:
Was für ein toller Ort. Ist eigentlich nichts für mich. Alles sehr gehoben. Aber mal eins kann man sich auch was schönes gönnen. Der Kellner hat sich bei mir persönlich mit Namen vorgestellt. Faszinierend. Er kam sogar aus den Niederlanden und wir haben ein wenig auf deutsch geplaudert. Er hatte hier ein Praktikum. 

Zur Begrüßung gab es ein paar Nüsse. Übrigens ist ab 21 Uhr Dresscode. Lange Hosen und tishrt, sowie Schuhe. Eine Hose habe ich aber vorn am Empfang gratis erhalten.

It's certainly impressive being so high up. I was a little disappointed that outside is only open to the sky and you have to look out through glass. There is still a nice breeze and good views but if your want nighttime photos of Central, the views are not as good as they could be, owing the lightning causing reflections in the  glass which surrounds the outdoor bar. Slightly lower bars are better for photography.

Drinks are very pricey, but the views from the top are breathtaking. If you are willing to spend outrageous prices for drinks you will enjoy your visit. A great spot to watch the nightly light show. The service was incredible as to be expected at the Ritz. They offered complimentary popcorn which was delicious. We got there very early so it wasn’t too crowded. If you want an amazing view of Hong Kong, visit OZONE.

result.adr_address: International Commerce Centre (ICC), 1 Austin Rd, Yau Ma Tei, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: International Commerce Centre (ICC), 1 Austin Rd, Yau Ma Tei, Hong Kong
result.name: The Ritz-Carlton, Hong Kong

reviews.text: I choose this hotel because I wanted to reside in the best hotel in Hong Kong.  Ritz Carlton matched 100% my expectations. The front desk service personnel was perfect. The Victoria Suite Room was really luxury and the Butler service was truly second to none. The hotel SPA is beautiful and the masseuse very capable. I got true value for my money. I certainly recommend this hotel to anyone who like me want the best.

Fabulous. I had the chance to have some drinks in the highest bar in the world! As all of the Ritz in the world, this one is a splendid site to rest. Pools, bars, comfort, and local/international food available. You wont miss a thing. Regarding to the customer service, it did match the expectations. Don't forget to ask for the lion's bag!

I booked the Ritz-Carlton recently for a two night stay for my wife and I, mainly because of the novelty of it being the highest hotel in the world, but the actual experience was so much more than that. From the moment we walked through the door we were treated like royalty, but in an incredibly warm and friendly way which didn't feel at all pretentious. The entire team seemed to go out of their way to make your stay something really special.

We were looked after by Marcus at the front desk who upgraded our room to a beautiful suite on the 116th floor giving incredible views over Hong Kong Island. We were surprised to see what I believe to be a 280cm wide bed, the biggest bed I've ever seen! Our room was on the same floor as the club lounge, where we spent a fair bit of time enjoying great food and drink, and amazing service.

My only regret about our stay here is that in two nights we didn't see as much of the city as we had imagined we would, simply because the hotel was so good that we wanted to enjoy it as much as possible. We'll definitely have to go back someday!

Thanks to all the team at the Ritz-Carlton who made our stay what it was!

I'm very impressive here. All staff very nice and  appreciate to help us. We got many kids in our trip and they take care them with a cute snack and the Ritz's lion bag including the art kits. Our kids very enjoy.

About the panorama view here is very superb, even I choose the deluxe suit I think it's worth to relax and have a nice date here.

Ahhh,, I almost forget to talk about the restroom. It's very Grand with the bath tub and their television. They provide the soap and the spa salt but I think it should be better if they have a bubble soap. I think their soap is not a good taste. It should be sweet smell more.
However, the shower set in the shower room is fine
.
Another comment is about the toilet ,, they have tissue paper but I didn't have a bin. I don't know why. It's outside the toilet so when we done we have to left it outside the toilet. I think some people might be left inside closet or they don't have any problem about that
.
Just a little problem ,,
The overall of the Ritz-Carlton HK is very nice to spend time and worthy
@papercrafter.th
.
โดยภาพรวมแล้วประทับใจมากกับที่นี่ค่ะ ในทริปของเรามีเด็กๆอยู่หลายคน ตอนที่เรามาเช็คอิน สตาฟได้เอาขนม เครื่องเขียนระบายสี และกระเป๋าสะพายสิงโตสุดน่ารัก พร้อมกับป้ายห้อยคอมาเพื่อให้เด็กๆใส่ ผู้ปกครองสามารถเขียนขื่อที่อยู่ เบอร์ติดต่อเอาไว้ได้ เผื่อน้องหลงทาง
.
รวมถึงในตอนเย็นมีขนมตกแต่งน่ารักเอาไว้เด็กๆในห้องอีกด้วย เมื่อเปิดประตูเข้ามาเด็กๆกรี๊ดเลยค่ะ แม้จะหวานเจี้ยบไปหน่อย แต่ก็ประทับใจมากๆ
.
อีกสิ่งหนึ่งนอกจากพาโนรามาวิวของริซคาลตันที่ขึ้นชื่อว่าเป็นวิวระดับไฮเอนด์ของฮ่องกงแล้ว ห้องน้ำก็ดีงามไม่แพ้กัน มีอ่างสปาพร้อมทีวีติดกระจก ให้จิบไวน์ นอนแช่ และดูหนังไปพร้อมกันได้ แต่ระวังเพลินจนตัวเปื่อยนะคะ เค้ามีสบู่และเกลือสปาเซอร์วิสให้ แต่ไม่มีบับเบิ้ลบาธ ใครที่ชอบแช่อ่างนุ่มๆ ละมุนๆ อาจจะต้องพกพาไปเองนะคะ สบู่ของเค้าไม่ค่อยหอมเท่าไหร่ด้วย พกกลิ่นที่ตัวเองชอบไปน่าจะสบายใจกว่า
.
แต่ที่ข้องใจคือ ห้องน้ำอันแยกเป็นสัดเป็นส่วนดีมาก ในห้องส้วมมีทิชชู่ แต่ไม่มีถังขยะ ทำให้ต้องเปิดประตูออกมาทิ้งข้างนอก หรือว่าโรงแรมให้ทิ้งในส้วมเลยได้นะ มันดูลำบากไปหน่อย น่าจะมีถังเอาไว้ให้
.
ห้องเราเป็นห้องดีลักซ์ และจองเตียงเสริมเอาไว้ด้วย ค่อนข้างดีทีเดียว แม้จะไม่ละมุนเหมือนเตียงใหญ่ แต่ก็เพิ่มแค่คืนละ 800HKD เท่านั้น
.
โดยรวมแล้ว คุ้มค่า ราคาไม่แพงสำหรับวิวและภาพรวมทั้งหมด การบริการสุดแสนประทับใจจริงๆ
อยากมีภาพรีวิวมากกว่านี้นะคะ แต่พอดีเด็กๆกระโดดขึ้นเตียงกันไปซะก่อน เจ่เจ้อดถ่ายเลย ^^

The hotel is a real 5 star with all attention to detail. There are a lot of art pieces everywhere. Staff are at Ritz Carlton standard. View from the room is magnificent. It is also very convenient if you take an airport express to/from the airport. The station is connected to the hotel via Elements mall. There are also Michelin star restaurants here. Fitness has great and modern equipment.

reviews.text: I choose this hotel because I wanted to reside in the best hotel in Hong Kong.  Ritz Carlton matched 100% my expectations. The front desk service personnel was perfect. The Victoria Suite Room was really luxury and the Butler service was truly second to none. The hotel SPA is beautiful and the masseuse very capable. I got true value for my money. Pools, bars, comfort, and local/international food available. You wont miss a thing. Regarding to the customer service, it did match the expectations. Don't forget to ask for the lion's bag!
入住一晚7000港幣含早餐的117層景觀升級房，只有景觀有值回票價，房間內的迎賓水果只有兩顆小蘋果，貴妃沙發椅縫線也已經裂開，浴室的放大鏡也是一直無法固定，這真的令人失望的住宿體驗！

I booked the Ritz-Carlton recently for a two night stay for my wife and I, mainly because of the novelty of it being the highest hotel in the world, but the actual experience was so much more than that. From the moment we walked through the door we were treated like royalty, but in an incredibly warm and friendly way which didn't feel at all pretentious. The entire team seemed to go out of their way to make your stay something really special.

We were looked after by Marcus at the front desk who upgraded our room to a beautiful suite on the 116th floor giving incredible views over Hong Kong Island. We were surprised to see what I believe to be a 280cm wide bed, the biggest bed I've ever seen! Our room was on the same floor as the club lounge, where we spent a fair bit of time enjoying great food and drink, and amazing service.

My only regret about our stay here is that in two nights we didn't see as much of the city as we had imagined we would, simply because the hotel was so good that we wanted to enjoy it as much as possible. We'll definitely have to go back someday!

Thanks to all the team at the Ritz-Carlton who made our stay what it was!
